text.en: Namo guru!
text.en-trans: namo guru

text.en: May the blessings of a master endowed with a spiritual lineage enter my own and all other beings’ minds.
text.en-trans: dakzhen nam kyi gyü la gyüden lamé jinlab jukpar gyur chik

text.en: May we recognise the ultimate meaning that has been introduced.
text.en-trans: dön gyi ngo trö né du chüpar gyur chik

text.en: May this realisation dawn perfectly within us.
text.en-trans: tokpa chi tawa zhindu gyü la kyewar gyur chik

text.en: May we receive a prophecy concerning both fearlessness and the ten powers.
text.en-trans: tob chu mi jik lungten tobpar gyur chik

text.en: May auspiciousness wax and superficiality wane.
text.en-trans: tatang drub ching tendrel charwar gyur chik

text.en: May we have the ability to place all beings on the path of ripening and liberation.
text.en-trans: dro nam mindrol gyi lam la gö nüpar gyur chik

text.en: May we have the ability to traverse the grounds and paths in a single sitting.
text.en-trans: salam dentok chik tu drö nüpar gyur chik

text.en: May the eyes of our wisdom come to see the truth of dharmatā.
text.en-trans: sherab kyi chen gyi chönyi kyi denpa tongwar gyur chik

text.en: May our virtues grow like leaves in springtime.
text.en-trans: yönten lodab zhin tu gyepar gyur chik

text.en: May fruition ripen like a wish-fulfilling tree.
text.en-trans: drebu paksam zhin tu minpar gyur chik

text.en: May our devotion be as stable as Mount Meru.
text.en-trans: mögü rirab zhin tu tenpar gyur chik

text.en: May we have certainty, free from any doubt.
text.en-trans: ngepé shepa tetsom dang dralwar gyur chik

text.en: May our aspirations be pure, as we experience the ripening of good karma.
text.en-trans: lé kyi tro sé né mönlam nampar dakpar gyur chik

text.en: May the armour [of our perseverance] be free of mundane defilement.
text.en-trans: goché jikten gyi drima dakpar gyur chik

text.en: May we have the ability to endure hardship and our practice be free from obstacle.
text.en-trans: drubpa la barché mé ching katub tsampar gyur chik

text.en: May our channels, winds and drops be pliable.
text.en-trans: tsa lung tiklé lé su rungwar gyur chik

text.en: May we continually have pure intentions.
text.en-trans: taktu sampa nampar dakpar gyur chik

text.en: May our bodhicitta never degenerate.
text.en-trans: changsem la nyampa mepar gyur chik

text.en: May we experience the view and meditation of the Mahāyāna.
text.en-trans: tekchen gyi ta gom nyam su nyongwar gyur chik

text.en: May our dualistic mind be naturally liberated.
text.en-trans: nyinang gi shepa rang sar drolwar gyur chik

text.en: May we be born into a noble family line.
text.en-trans: rik khyepar chen tu kyewar gyur chik

text.en: May we be cared for by a master of [the sublime] lineage.
text.en-trans: gyüden lamé jesu dzinpar gyur chik

text.en: May our conduct never be unwholesome.
text.en-trans: lékyi ta mi lokpar gyur chik

text.en: May we train our minds in the three types of knowledge.1
text.en-trans: sherab sum la lo jongwar gyur chik

text.en: May we receive the blessings of empowerment.
text.en-trans: wang gi jinlab jukpar gyur chik

text.en: May we attain the vajra-like bliss.
text.en-trans: dewa dorjé tabur tobpar gyur chik

text.en: May we come to master consciousness, the channels and subtle energies.
text.en-trans: namshé tsalung la rangwang tobpar gyur chik

text.en: May we accomplish the rūpakāya as our own body.
text.en-trans: rang lü zukku drubpar gyur chik

text.en: May we realise the dharmakāya directly.
text.en-trans: chöku ngönsum du tokpar gyur chik

text.en: With the activities of the emanation-kāya, may we perfectly accomplish others' welfare.
text.en-trans: tulku trinlé kyi zhendön ta ru chinpar gyur chik
